inicio.menciona:
Hi! Type `.ahelp` or `.ah` to see the command menu :D
_Você pode alterar meu idioma para português com o comando `.alang pt`_
inicio.cooldown: seconds to run this command again.
inicio.error_1: Wrrrooong, the correct use of the command is

diversao.aviso_1:
Tag two people to test
For example, `.alove @Alonsal @Slondo`

diversao.error_2: get out of here your CAT :cow: TLE, test it with another user

diversao.aviso_1: Enter something in addition to this command, for example `.ana alonsal > odnols`
diversao.sorte: There was a repetition of words! Lucky you?

diversao.nsfw_jaja: Due to the excess of delight, this command can only be used on an NSFW channel.

diversao.aviso_1:
Write something for this command
For example, `.asans slomdo very cringerrr afff`

jogos.conteudo:
The 1st Game created by SLondo!
How far can you run? Test now!
jogos.rodape: The game may not run properly on mobile phones.

jogos.aviso_1: Enter heads or tails as `.aco heads` or `.aco tails` to test your luck!
Enter **numbers only** for the amount of dice and number of faces
jogos.aviso_2: Enter at least 1 die as `.ada 1 <faces>` to be able to run.
jogos.error_1: It is not possible to take more than 50 dice at the same time..
jogos.error_2: It is not possible to draw geometric solids with more than 10,000 faces.
jogos.error_3: It is not possible to rotate geometric solids with less than 4 faces.

jogos.aviso_1: Write as `.ajkp paper` or `.ajkp` for a random match.
Inform at least 2 items for me to choose
jogos.aviso_2: Enter a quantity in numbers such as `.ach [2 s a l 4 d @` and a value greater than zero
jogos.escolho_todos: You entered a number greater than or equal to the number of options, I choose them all!

manutencao.titulo: > Oh open up the way I want to go :notes:
manutencao.despachei: I sent the invitation in your dm :love_you_gesture:

manutencao.link: Contribute by reporting bugs or stealing codes from Alonsal :pray_tone2:
manutencao.despachei: I shipped the most recent wax in your dm :handshake:

manutencao.conteudo_1:
This bot is sponsored by Baidu and Renato's snack, 40 kinds of snacks, hot dog, fast food in 5 minutes, the biggest snack bar in Extrema, come eat the renatão of 4, the complete snack!

:mailbox: Suggest commands or report bugs using the **`.amail <your msg>`**
:page_facing_up: Use **`.ag`** or **`.agit`** to view the Alonsal repository
manutencao.conteudo_3:
**`.asuporte`** - Help maintain and develop Alonsal

-----------------------------
> OTHER RESOURCES
Phrases of **`.aga`** | **`.agado`** commands are fully owned by @GadoDecider, all credits go to him. ( https://twitter.com/GadoDecider )

-----------------------------
> NOTES
Phrases from **`.atext`** do not represent the ideas of the creators of Alonsal, therefore, they are for comic purposes only.

utilitarios.wiki_slondo: This bum is not on the wiki, look for something else! :sunglasses:
utilitarios.sem_dados: I didn't find anything related to your search
utilitarios.auto_pesquisa: Why are you researching yourself? There's nothing about you here

utilitarios.decodificado: :zero: Your message decoded from the binary
utilitarios.aviso: Type something to use this command
utilitarios.error_1: Unable to convert, maximum size exceeded!

utilitarios.nao_conhecido: I don't know this user, use the command by marking him! :smiling_imp:

utilitarios.aviso_1: Write something or send a file to me and I will return it
utilitarios.aviso_2: Only upload 1 file at a time
utilitarios.error_1: I can't talk in TTS in this chat

utilitarios.aviso_1:
Enter something to be removed or replaced and a string
For example `.arm o slondo` or `.arp i o slindo`
utilitarios.remove_tudo: You removed everything, there's nothing left

utilitarios.aviso_1:
Enter the name of some city to search
For example, as `.awe los angeles`
utilitarios.aviso_2: I didn't find any place called

utilitarios.aviso_continente: These data are an average of all values for the continent surveyed
utilitarios.aviso_pais: These data are an average of all values in the country surveyed
utilitarios.aviso_planeta: These data are an average of all surveyed values on the planet
utilitarios.error_1: Just enter normal characters for your search, searches with numbers are ignored

utilitarios.nao_encontrado: I didn't find any item or block with the name
utilitarios.error_1: Could not load database at this time, please try again later
utilitarios.nota_rodape: This item has not been officially implemented yet, your data is unofficial

utilitarios.acontecimentos_2: Below are all events on the date of
utilitarios.aviso_1:
Submit as `.ahs 01-31` to be able to search on a specific date
Or just use `.ahs` to see events on today's date from history
utilitarios.aviso_2: Values entered are wrong, please enter correct numerical values for day and month
utilitarios.error_1: Enter a number contained in the event list to see more details
utilitarios.sem_entradas: There are no events for this date, please enter a different date `.acon 01-21`

utilitarios.aviso_1:
Enter a key and the text to be encrypted
For example, `.acr slondo Hello World!`, or `.acr slondo U2FsdG~~`
utilitarios.error_1:
Incorrect key, unable to decrypt
If you are trying to encrypt, add more spaces to your text

utilitarios.moderador: This member is an administrator on this server

utilitarios.error_1: Profile not found, make sure the profile searched has a custom url
utilitarios.error_2: This profile exists but there was an error loading it
utilitarios.rodape: Some (or all) of this user's data is not available in his profile
utilitarios.suspeito: This user may be using illegal means to get achievements, do not consider this as a confirmation

utilitarios.aviso_1: Enter at least one basic operation to calculate
utilitarios.error: An error occurred while processing this operation

musicas.aviso_1: Join a voice channel to use these commands
musicas.aviso_2: Add more URL's to the playlist to be able to remove them
musicas.aviso_3:
Enter something other than `.a`
For example `.as simian segue` or as `.as https://youtu.be/yBLdQ1a4-JI`
musicas.aviso_4: Voice channel full, change channels or increase user limit.
musicas.aviso_5: The songs are off for a few days, these commands will be back soon!
musicas.error_1: I cannot connect to this channel, switch channels or update my permissions to use these commands
musicas.error_2: There is a problem with this URL, please enter a different one
musicas.tocando_url: This track is already playing or in the queue, wait!

musicas.aviso_1: There are no tracks in the playlist, add some to access this command
musicas.ordenando: Sorting the songs in the playlist, wait a little :P
musicas.free: :free: There is no track currently playing..
musicas.processando: a moment, i'm still processing the playlist.

musicas.album_completo: Complete album! Let's listen to all tracks before adding others? :P
musicas.aviso_1: Write as `.asra ms 2`, `.asra me 7`, `.asra jg 5` or `.asra op 10` ;)
musicas.aviso_2: I can choose up to 15 random songs at a time, enter a smaller number :P
musicas.aviso_3: I can choose up to 15 songs from random funny songs at a time, enter a smaller number :P
musicas.aviso_4: I can choose up to 15 random soundtracks at a time, enter a smaller number :P
musicas.aviso_5: I can choose up to 15 random classical songs at a time, enter a smaller number :P
musicas.escolhidas_1: songs have been automatically added to the playlist, use `.aspl` to see them.
musicas.escolhidas_2: funny songs have been automatically added to the playlist, use `.aspl` to see them.
musicas.escolhidas_3: game soundtracks have been automatically added to the playlist, use `.aspl` to see them.
musicas.escolhidas_4: classic songs have been automatically added to the playlist, use `.aspl` to see them.

musicas.aviso_1: There is no music currently playing.

musicas.anuncio_faixas: Use `.asfd` to disable posting of new tracks
musicas.error_2: An error occurred and we could not continue playing this URL
musicas.skip: Use `.assk` to skip to the next song
musicas.sem_faixas: I'm out of songs, let's hear more?
musicas.desconectado: I disconnected due to inactivity use `.as` again to play something :call_me:

musicas.aviso_1: enter a track number to be able to skip
musicas.aviso_2: there is no way to jump to the current track :v
musicas.aviso_3: Start some music with `.as url` or `.asra` to be able to skip.
musicas.error_1: The number entered is greater than the current playlist

musicas.reiniciando: Resetting Alonsais configs for songs and playlists
musicas.repeteco_1: Repeating enabled, use `.asrp` again to disable.
musicas.playlist_pequena: Small playlist, I'll stop saying song names when they start :man_detective:
musicas.sem_faixas: No tracks in playlist, insert some by searching or using random
musicas.anuncio_faixas: Use `.asfd` to turn off announcing new tracks :thumbsup:
musicas.anuncios_1: I will announce the tracks that start playing
musicas.anuncios_2: Okay, no announcements for new tracks that start playing

musicas.removido_1: All next tracks have been removed..
musicas.removido_3: has been removed from the playlist.

musicas.aviso_2: Enter a track number to be able to remove
